title: Roman-ish italic
content:
Anyone recognize this font? Capital letters stand straight and seriffed, small letters italicize. In addition: Roman, Italics, anyone want to give me an etymological lecture on these seemingly italian roots? And.... GO!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121152219im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Romanish_5365.jpg)

edit: Please and Thank You

author: jrgott
